name: EXT_OTHER_ORGANS
description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field Extent of Involvement of Other Organs.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_OTHER_ORGANS_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Extent of Involvement of Other Organs.
entries: Bladder mucosa and / or bowel mucosa
